channel.title: Hosting a server where to put cache?
channel.description:
I am using Ben's Project source (just using it to mess around with, and play with a couple friends as well) I've uploaded my cache to dropbox, I've put the link in settings.java in the server, but I get "Exception in thread "main" java.io.FileNotFoundException:" When I run the server. I guess it's just saying it can't download the cache or something? Can anybody help me with this? I don't feel like hearing "if you can't do this or that, then you shouldn't be trying".
Thanks in advance, I will supply more about the issue if need be.
Also not sure if this is in the correct section. /=
10 hours later or so, can anybody help? /=
The full error. /=
[code]Launching Server... [Launcher] Initing Cache... Exception in thread "main" java.io.FileNotFoundException: http:\dl.dropbox.com\u \97376983\cache.zipmain_file_cache.dat2 (The filename, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.open(Native Method) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(Unknown Source) at com.alex.store.Store.<init>(Store.java:34) at com.alex.store.Store.<init>(Store.java:28) at com.alex.store.Store.<init>(Store.java:24) at com.rs.cache.Cache.init(Cache.java:20) at com.rs.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:68) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Hosting a server where to put cache?
item.dc:creator: @Alex13 -Alex-
item.description:
@Alex13 wrote:

[quote=“luna-scape, post:4, topic:477429”][quote author=-Alex- link=topic=595622.msg4193879#msg4193879 date=1357225548]

It cannot find the file, it expects it to be local. You cannot host your cache online like that, you’d have to create a method to download the cache into your tempoary files and run the client from the downloaded files

Any idea how I’d go about that? ;s
[/quote]

There are shit loads of tutorials on how to make an auto cache downloader[/quote]
Alright, thanks. Hopefully I can find one that works for a 718.

Thanks guys.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Alex13 -Alex-
item.description:
@Alex13 wrote:

I am using Ben’s Project source (just using it to mess around with, and play with a couple friends as well)
I’ve uploaded my cache to dropbox, I’ve put the link in settings.java in the server, but I get “Exception in thread “main” java.io.FileNotFoundException:” When I run the server.
I guess it’s just saying it can’t download the cache or something?
Can anybody help me with this?
I don’t feel like hearing “if you can’t do this or that, then you shouldn’t be trying”.

Thanks in advance, I will supply more about the issue if need be.

Also not sure if this is in the correct section. /=

10 hours later or so, can anybody help? /=

Launching Server... [Launcher] Initing Cache...
